apihash.description: you app API hash. get it from my.telegram.org

apiid.description: you app API ID. get it from my.telegram.org

string_session_key.description: your string session key. get this by running stringsession.py from repo

allowed_chats.description: List of chats your bot is allowed to run. this is helpful to prevent spam. space seprated list of ids. you can get these ids by .id plugin of bot

my_name_aliases.description: your hidden eye on who is speaking your name RTFM
